item.title: Emergency Medicine: An Overview
item.authors: Dr. Mark Silver, Dr. Lily Gold
item.abstract: An introductory guide to the principles of emergency medicine, including core concepts and practices.

item.title: Retrieval Medicine: Challenges and Solutions
item.abstract: Exploring the field of retrieval medicine within emergency care, focusing on logistical challenges and innovative solutions.
item.authors: Dr. Steve Cyan, Dr. Betty Magenta

item.title: Toxicological Emergencies: A Quick Guide
item.authors: Dr. Joe Quartz, Dr. Ellie Ruby
item.abstract: Understanding the rapid response required for toxicological emergencies and how to effectively manage these cases.
